title: november 16: don’t sue me for sharing
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about a series of threatening letters sent by the Recording Industry Association of America to colleges and universities about illegal music downloading, and then details how file sharing reached such a fever pitch. She also revisits a favorite music release from 2018. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
